channel.title: Hardware on Tokyo Tsushin Kogyo
channel.description: Recent content in Hardware on Tokyo Tsushin Kogyo

item.title: Papa Sierra Four
item.description: Tokyo Tsushin Kogyo Condition XODY Many inhabitants of the galaxy are unable to obtain a pilot’s licence from the pilot’s federation due to a condition called XODY. Not much is known about XODY but it’s debilitating effects on anyone attempting space travel are now well documented. The Pilot’s Federation have refused to issue people with documented XODY a pilot’s licence since 3300. Anyone with XODY wanting to travel has had to be sedated and travel as a passenger.

item.title: Papa Sierra Four Hardware Index
item.description: The purpose of this page is to provide a user tested list of hardware known to work with the Papa Sierra Four. HOTAS are the primary focus but other devices are listed. HOTAS Thrustmaster T.Flight HOTAS 4 Bluetooth Keyboards Rii i8+BT Mini Keyboard - CHAT ONLY

item.title: Credits
